content.text:
# 2007 Kingfisher Airlines Tennis Open – Singles

Richard Gasquet
| runner   =  Olivier Rochus
| score    = 6–3, 6–4
| edition  =
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Dmitry Tursunov was the defending champion, but chose not to participate that year.
Richard Gasquet won in the final 6–3, 6–4, against Olivier Rochus.
Seeds
Richard Gasquet (champion)
#  Lleyton Hewitt (quarterfinals)
#  Paul-Henri Mathieu (first round)
#  Jarkko Nieminen (quarterfinals)
#  Fabrice Santoro (semifinals)
#  Stefan Koubek (quarterfinals)
#  Julien Benneteau (first round)
#  Olivier Rochus (final)
}}
